items.title: Participating Restaurants
items.description: Only registered restaurants can participate in the recycling program. Registration is free and open to all licensed establishments.

items.title: Bottle Collection
items.description: Collect empty Gorkha, Carlsberg, and Tuborg bottles from your restaurant. Ensure bottles are clean and undamaged for proper recycling.

items.title: XP Points System
items.description: Earn XP points for each bottle recycled. Points are calculated based on bottle type and quantity. Track your progress on the leaderboard.

items.title: Monthly Rankings
items.description: Leaderboard resets monthly. Top performing restaurant each month receives special rewards including Pool Table, Beer Dispenser Unit, or Premium Lighting Installation.

items.title: Milestone Achievements
items.description: Reach milestone targets to unlock exclusive rewards. First 5 restaurants to cross 5,000 XP receive Branded Mini Fridge or Speaker.

items.title: Grand Finale
items.description: Top 3 restaurants at the end of the program receive Grand Finale Rewards including trip to Thailand, event hosting credits, and premium table sets.

monthly.title: Monthly High Performers
monthly.description: Top restaurant of each month will receive one of the following: Pool Table, Beer Dispenser Unit, or Premium Lighting Installation.

milestone.title: Milestone Rewards
milestone.description: First 5 restaurants to cross 5,000 XP receive Branded Mini Fridge or Speaker; First 10 restaurants to cross 10,000 XP receive Outdoor Umbrella + Gorkha Branded Chairs.

grandFinale.title: Grand Finale Rewards
grandFinale.top1Desc: Trip to Thailand covering flight tickets, hotel bookings and transportation in package.
grandFinale.top2Desc: Event Hosting Credit + Free Gorkha Beer
